sentences.sentence: She has tried to superimpose her own attitudes onto this ancient story.
sentences.translation: 她想把自己的看法加入这个古老的故事里。

sentences.sentence: You can superimpose the lettering directly onto one of your pictures.
sentences.translation: 你可以把这些文字直接叠印在你的一张照片上。

sentences.sentence: In fact, you could even superimpose your logo onto the image instead of a corner.
sentences.translation: 实际上，您甚至可以用您的徽标取代角来叠加到图像上。
